benefits.body2: Linky bridges the gap by using smart sourcing to find the original product at its real market price, dealing with customs, and delivering it to you cheaper than local retail.
benefits.card1d: You can decline our offer anytime before payment. No questions asked.
benefits.card2d: Pay only a fraction upfront. The rest upon delivery to your door.
benefits.card3d: Forget complex shipping addresses. We handle logistics end-to-end.
benefits.card4d: The price we quote is final. No hidden customs fees or taxes later.

terms.title: Terms & Conditions
body: Linky.ge is a service where users submit a product link they found in Georgia (pharmacy, store, online shop, etc.).

After receiving the link, our team reviews the item and typically sends an offer within 3 business days: delivery of the exact same product (often sourced from Europe or the US) with a clear price and estimated delivery time.
After you receive the offer, you can either accept or decline. If you decline, the request is cancelled and you have no further obligation.
If you accept, you pay 50% of the offered price upfront. The remaining 50% is paid once the status becomes “Arrived”.
Order statuses update as the process moves forward: New / Offered / Accepted / In transit / Arrived / Delivered / Cancelled.
The offered price includes all costs, including courier delivery in Tbilisi. No hidden fees — the amount you see in the offer is the final total.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
body: Linky.ge processes only the data required to prepare the offer and deliver the order (e.g., contact details and delivery address).
We use this information to send offers, update order statuses, confirm payments, and arrange delivery.
We do not sell or share your personal information with third parties for marketing purposes.
Payments are handled by a secure payment provider. Linky.ge does not store card details (adjust this text if your setup differs).
You may request data correction or deletion by contacting our support team.

support.title: Support
body: If you have questions about an offer, payment, or status — contact us and we’ll help.
For faster assistance, include your order number or the submitted product link.
Typical response hours: 10:00–19:00 (Mon–Sat).

about.title: About Linky.ge
body: Linky.ge helps you bring the exact item you find in Georgia.
You send a link — we source the same product (often from Europe or the US) and send a transparent offer within 3 business days, including price and delivery time.
You decide whether to accept. If accepted, you pay 50% upfront and the remaining amount once the item arrives.
Our goal is a simple process, real savings, and a fixed final price with no hidden charges.
